с Free up space! Unsuitable material! Unsuitable fuel!
Unlock the elevator - 512$ [color=#ffff00]:[/color] Not enough money! You have -
Press to continue
Hello. It's you again! Caught stealing diamond apples again? In our prison, inmates are assigned mandatory work in the mine. Come with me, I'll show you everything. You can buy food and enhancement potions here. Always think about food before going into the mine! Or else you'll starve to death. It's a magical building. It's not finished yet, but we'll get to that later. This is my office. Here you can buy special items and upgrades! Look out for Super Pickaxe. For she will help you esca... Uh... Anyway, never mind. Let's go on. Here you can pay off your debt! And gradually unlock new opportunities in the game. For example, build a building or open a slot machine. Here you can buy pickaxes and other useful things for resource extraction. Finally, you can sell all the resources you mine here. Further down is a mine and a couple other buildings. You explore it yourself. Here's a starter kit. You can dig anywhere. Good luck.
Save Resume Name of world Teleport to the bed no saves click play Return to spawn point

i'm free [color=#53c924]Developer:[/color] Hi! Write in the reviews what you'd like to add to the game? A different world? Or more crafting? I'm very interested! It would help the game become better^^ Thank you!
[color=#53c924]![/color] To set a block - right-click the mouse button (RMB/) in the desired location [color=#53c924]![/color] To install a block, touch the desired location with your finger
Craft [color=#53c924]![/color] Only Coal or Birch can be used as fuel! Speed up Х2 (Ad) Boost - [color=#53c924]:[/color] All furnaces boosted by half! Bonus +50$ Help me! Boss said if you pay him 5000$, then [color=#ffff00]he'll let me out![/color] Save me, please!!!
Thank you for saving me! You're so cool! And thanks for the money! Now I have enough money to trim my mustache! That was me! I hope you enjoyed my prank :D Don't get upset. Take your money back. And take these luckyblocks, I don't need them anyway.
[color=#b55088]![/color] Someone mysterious has visited your prison cell! [color=#b55088]![/color] The night merchant has disappeared. [color=#ffff00]![/color] This block can't be put on back layer! [color=#ffff00]![/color] First you have to destroy the top block!
[color=#53c924]![/color] To put blocks on the back layer, press and hold SHIFT [color=#53c924]![/color] Block mode: Front layer [color=#53c924]![/color] Block mode: Back layer
Get 5000$ Price: 10 [color=#ffff00]![/color] Wheat can only be planted on moistened and plowed dirt!
Help To break and put blocks on the back layer, hold down SHIFT. The blocks on this layer are only decorations and do not function. To turn on the back blocks mode, press the button with the squares near the right joystick. To put and break, press the "A" button that appears near the left joystick.
Stone generator Mobs Back layer Farming Dig a small hole with a depression in the center. Next, pour lava and water around the edges. Done! Plow the ground with a hoe, spill water nearby (the water feeds 3 neighboring blocks). Plant the seeds (you can get them from grass). And wait! Animals and monsters spawn on a flat surface of 3 blocks of grass. It is important that it be loose two blocks up. Monsters cannot appear during the day. Shop
Luckyblock Water bucket Lava bucket Grass х16 Coal х16 Cake х4 Buy for 0.99

//~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~questsSystem~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Bulletin Board Quest Timer min // time quests Reward coins // reward accept complete Timer expired:[color=#a22633] Assignment canceled you got negative reputation![/color] reputation Points: to the award Are you sure you want to cancel the quest? your reputation will diminish
// time quests ---------------------------> //1 Grain for the hensbargain: My hens need a little more feed than I had time to stockpile Grow 10 wheat
//2 FavoriteAnonymous: I'm going to propose to the principal tomorrow, but I lost the diamond from my ring! Help me out! Get 1 diamond
//3 Black GoldThe Hoarder Heroes! Coal stocks are starting to go up! We need to dig up some coal right away and we'll be rich, baby!" Get 20 coal
//4 Mommy's SoupCook: I'm experimenting with my mom's soup recipe here. I need pork. This is going to be the bomb!" Bring 5 pork.
//5 Zombie InvasionDirector: We have too many zombies breeding! We've got to do something about it! Kill 10 zombies
//6 Not my favorite gardenThe hoarder: Who came up with these weird birch trees? Striped oaks! They're ridiculous! We should take them down. Cut 8 blocks of birch trees
//7 Let there be light! Director:. We're having a little trouble with the electricity. We need coal immediately! Get 15 coal
//8 Favorites! Cook: I'm out of sticks. I need them for smoking the pork. This is extremely important! Fetch 10 sticks
//9 evil customers! Schachter:. I've lost an important order! If you don't help me, I'm finished! Fetch 10 coal 5 iron ingots 5 copper bars //10 The guest of honorThe hustler:. My mom wants to visit me today! She's on her way! I need your help right away!!! Bring 5 flowers Bring cake
// no timer ---------------------------> //1 Delicious recipeCook: For my delicious pie recipe, I need the best ingredients 5 apples 10 wheat 1 oven //2 Dark TimesMiner:. My store's supply of torches is down. Help me find the materials and I'll make them myself!" 10 Wood 10 Coal
//3 A closet updateDirector:. I'm going to knit myself a new red tie Get 10 threads Get 5 red flowers
//4 Making picksMiner:. I'm going to make a lot of new picks, but I'm missing a few things, can you help me out? 10 birch blocks 10 oak blocks 10 iron ore //5 Mystery Ritual Anonymous:. I need materials for my secret ritual. Get them for me! Get 6 bones Get 5 red flowers. Get 2 pigs //6 Your Highness!Director: I want a crown for myself! Get 5 gold Get 2 emeralds Get 1 diamond //7 Love of natureMiner: In my free time, I want to catch beautiful butterflies! I wish you could help me with the materials for the sap Bring 5 threads Bring 2 sticks
//8 WannabeSchachter:. I want to be as cool as you! Power Potion 10 ladders Stone pickaxe //9 Winter is coming!"Cook:. I need help with my winter preparations. Can you help me? 10 wheat 10 pork 10 apples //10 Scary noises! Director: I have scary sounds coming from a hole in the floor. I'm too young to die! You have to help me fix the crack! 10 planks 10 iron bars
//11 ----> new Feast! Cook: Karaul! My relatives are coming to visit me tomorrow. And I need to set a table for them. The problem is that there are 40 of them!". 40 apples 40 pork 40 cakes
//12 ShelterMiner: I read in my horoscope that the apocalypse is coming soon! We urgently need strategic supplies and, of course, a safe haven!". 100 boards 100 iron ingots 50 pork //13 Business idea!Bargain: I found it! Here it is! The coolest business plan I've ever come up with! We need to raise our capital stock! We're going to get rich!". 100 sticks 100 blocks of earth 100 coal //14 Noob you're a jeweler! Director: Hi, buddy. I recently saw a duck bathing in jewelry on TV! I now have a new dream!". 50 diamonds 50 gold
